description.value:
Aspect bloodglass

Prerequisites You are a summoner and within 30ft of your eidolon.

Defense basic Reflex

Activate 1 (concentrate)

Edara allows Iúna to reach into the bonding sigil between herself and Litsaryara. Iúna channels its energy between them, creating a churning of quintessence, transforming the ambient moisture in the air into a whirlwind of bloodglass shards. The whirlwind does @Damage[9d6[spirit], 9d6[slashing]]{9d6 spirit damage and 9d6 slashing damage} to all foes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] that includes both you and your eidolon in its area of effect, with a basic Reflex save. The whirlwind flows harmlessly around and through your allies, giving any allies it touches temporary HP equal to the relic's level. You can't use this activation again for [[/r 2d4]]{2d4 rounds}.
